question: What type of light never casts a shadow in a 3D scene?
Where do you change the shutter angle for the motion blur in a composition?
options: on the Basic tab of the Composition Settings dialog box
on the Advanced tab of the Composition Settings dialog box
on the 3D Renderer tab of the Composition Settings dialog box
in the File > Project Settings dialog box
answer: on the Advanced tab of the Composition Settings dialog box

question: What is a null object?
options: a special layer used to hold expressions
an invisible layer that has all the properties of a visible layer so it can be parented to any layer in the composition
a solid layer with a black background that can be parented to any layer in the composition
a visible layer that can be parented to any layer in the composition
answer: an invisible layer that has all the properties of a visible layer so it can be parented to any layer in the composition

question: What adjustment in the Lumetri Color effect can help restore edge detail to the footage?
Where can you control the settings for footage created from an After Effects composition?
Which blur effect supports using a depth matte to define the focal range?
How can you create a direct relationship between two-layer properties?
options: Use the pick whip to enable Parenting.
Use the pick whip to enable Connecting.
answer: Use the pick whip to enable Parenting.

question: Which technique is useful for creating slow-motion, fast-motion, freeze frame, or other retiming results for a layer?

An image was created on a transparent background in Photoshop using different dimensions to an After Effects composition. Which option was used when importing the PSD file below to place the image at its original scale and position?
options: Click Import As > Composition – Retain Layer Size.
answer: Click Import As > Composition – Retain Layer Size.

question: How can you render a file in the background and keep working in After Effects?
options: Click File > Export > Add to Adobe Media Encoder Queue.
Click File > Export > Add to Render Queue.
answer: Click File > Export > Add to Adobe Media Encoder Queue.

question: Which property can be added to a 3D layer? (Select three items.)
You'd like to include controls from an After Effects composition in the Essential Graphics panel. What is one way to do this?
options: Command+click (Mac) or Ctrl+click (Windows) property in the Timeline to add it to the Essential Graphics panel.
Drag a property from the Timeline into the Essential Graphics panel.
Double-click a property in the Timeline to add it to the Essential Graphics panel.
answer: Drag a property from the Timeline into the Essential Graphics panel.

question: You have applied the Auto Levels effect but notice flickering in the results. How can you reduce this?
options: Increase the Blend with Original property.

question: Which type of light is used in this scene?
Which effect recovers alpha-channel details from a scene keyed by a typical keying effect, including recovering details lost due to compression artifacts?
If you want to apply an effect to multiple layers and adjust all layers at once, which method should you use?
options: Use the layer pick whip to link properties.
Set one layer effect and then copy and paste its results to the other layers.

question: You want to scale all elements in a composition, including the composition itself. How can you do this?
options: Link all layers and then change the composition settings.
In the Composition Settings dialog box, scale the composition dimensions and the layers will scale to match.

question: Holding the Shift key when rotating a 3D layer constrains the rotation to how many degrees?
How can you choose which frame of composition to show as a thumbnail image for the composition in the Project panel?
options: Select the desired frame in the Composition Settings dialog box.
Move the playhead to the desired frame and click Composition > Set Poster Time.
You cannot change the thumbnail image. You cannot change the thumbnail image.
From the Render Queue, go to Render Settings to set the thumbnail image.
answer: Select the desired frame in the Composition Settings dialog box.

question: When you want to add properties to the Essential Graphics panel, how can you easily see only the supported properties?
options: Type "PP" twice with the Timeline panel active.
Click the Solo Supported Properties button in the Essential Graphics panel.
Switch to the Essential Graphics workspace.
All properties are supported by the Essential Graphics panel.
answer: Click the Solo Supported Properties button in the Essential Graphics panel.

question: You want to take an existing layer and make it into two separate layers. How can you do this such that the separation occurs at the playhead?
How can you create a single composition from multiple footage items?
options: Select the items and click File > New Project.
Select the items and click Composition > New Composition from Selection.
Drag the selected footage items to the Create a New Composition button at the bottom of the Project panel.
Select the items and click Composition > New Composition.
answer: Select the items and click Composition > New Composition from Selection.

question: You attach a video monitor to view your color correction. Where can you configure the monitor’s preferences?
A file is in the Render Queue but cannot be rendered. You see that it is labeled Needs Output. What should you do?
options: Set an output file name from the Render To menu.
Set an output file name and location from the Output To menu.
answer: Set an output file name and location from the Output To menu.

question: Which effect cannot be applied to a mask shape?
What type of object creates a single-color layer for use as a backdrop?
What is the maximum number of masks that can be applied to a single layer in an After Effects 7.0 composition?
What is Adobe After Effects primarily used for?
Which panel in After Effects allows you to organize and control your project assets?
In After Effects, what does the "Keyframe" function allow you to do?
Which file format is commonly used for importing and exporting video in After Effects?
What is the purpose of the "Puppet Pin Tool" in After Effects?
What is the workspace layout called where you can preview your composition in After Effects?
Which of the following effects in After Effects allows you to simulate the appearance of real-world camera depth of field?
What does the "Wiggle Expression" do in After Effects?
options: Adds random motion to a layer
Applies a color effect to text
answer: Adds random motion to a layer

question: In After Effects, what does the "Track Matte" feature do?
options: Creates transitions between two video clips
answer: Creates transitions between two video clips

question: Which of the following is a keyframe interpolation method in After Effects that creates smooth, flowing animations between keyframes?
Which shortcut key provides quick access to the Opacity controls for a selected layer?
What happens when you change the zero point (origin) for the rulers in the Composition viewer (panel)?
options: After effects begins calculating according to new origin of the composition only for 3D layers.
After effects begins calculating from the middle of the composition.
After effects begins calculating according to the new origin of the composition.
After effects continues to calculate from the top-left origin of the composition.
answer: After effects begins calculating according to the new origin of the composition.

question: Changes made to rotation or position in 3D space are attached to the layer and not based on the composition. Which axis mode would you want to use to have changes based on the axes in the Composition panel?
Which characteristics do the Render settings control?
#### A. Output frame rate
#### B. Compression options
#### C. Duraction
#### D. Cropping
#### E. Layer quality
Which Keyframe Assistant is shown here?
Which path operation creates multiple copies of a single shape?
Write characteristics do the output module settings control?
#### A. Output frame rate
#### B. Output format
#### C. Compression options
#### D. Cropping
#### E. Time span
options: Animate layers by manually drawing their motion paths
